Property.Name: InternalField
Property.Description: Model of the internal magnetic field of Jupiter. Mandatory: No default value

Property.Name: CurrentSheet
Property.Description: Model of the Jovian magnetopshere current sheet contribution to the total magnetic field. Default is none.

Property.Name: IMF
Property.Description: Interplanetary Magnetic Field vector, each of the three component must be given in nT in the JSO coordinate system. Default value is 0,0,0

Property.Name: CoordinateSystem
Property.Description: Coordinate system in which the vectors and positions will be sent back, and in which the positions must be given when needed. Note: PlanetaryCartesian and PlanetarySpherical are right-handed coordinate systems, whereas Planetographic is left-handed (e.g. SystemIII).
Property.PropertyValue: PlanetaryCartesian PlanetarySpherical Planetographic JSO JSM JSS

Parameter.Name: Magnetic field
Parameter.Description: Vector magnetic field. Note that for spherical coordinate system, labal do not change but Bx stands for the radial component, By for the co-latitudinal one and Bz for the longitudinal one.
